item.title: How to Self-Administer Medical Injections Sustainably
item.description: How to Self-Administer Medical Injections Sustainably This guide is written under the assumption that you are doing Intramuscular rather than Subcutaneous shots; though the vast majority is applicable to both injection methods.

item.title: Injection Checklist and Steps
item.description: Injection Checklist and Steps Checklist Items You’ll Need Your vial/bottle/ampoule of medication A syringe A draw needle (around 18g. Optional, but highly recommended) An injection needle (around 23g or 25g) A sharps container (a 2L bottle works fine!
